DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
If this is the first card played this turn, there is an additional effect.
Battered creatures take 10% increased damage per stack from Attacks.
When taking damage, applies #yBattered to a random enemy.
When played, ALL alternate cards change effects.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
